item.description:
OUTING ANNOUNCEMENT

WHERE: The little attached island jutting into Portsmouth harbor.

WHEN: 3 hours starting at the posted time

THE SCENE: Sensationally beautiful little undiscovered mini-island, jutting out into Portsmouth harbor. Easily accessible from the parking lot. On the island are picnic tables, rest rooms, grass and landscaped bushes. The view includes waterfront and boats.

WHERE TO MEET*: At the posted time, with 1/2 hour leeway for late-comers. Let's meet on the island, which is small.

DIRECTIONS: From Portsmouth center, drive towards the water, bearing right towards Strawberry Bank. With Strawberry Bank on your right, the park along the harbor on your left continue straight about 1/2 mile until you see a left turn going over a small bridge. It's at the end of the park. Take a left, go over the bridge, and the parking area for the island is shortly on your left.

OTHER:
RSVPs: It's best to let us know you are coming so we can look for you or alert you to any changes.
THINGS TO BRING WHICH ARE OFTEN FORGOTTEN:
Mosquito repellant, Paper towels, Sweater, water, food
IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.

*LAX: We meet at the time above. You have 30 minutes additional slack, after which we may leave to the painting site without you.

INCLEMENT WEATHER: It is up to you to determine if the weather makes painting untenable. Although, I will try to leave a message on my voice mail if I myself do not intend to be there.

Michael Emerald
617/968-0627
westpointusma@yahoo.com
item.name: Portsmouth Harbor, Portsmouth, NH
